A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What they did with Luke was a crime. I do understand the need to pass the baton to a new generation but it could have done in a much better way. At the end they could have sent Luke out into the galaxy to look for the next generation or something. I have waited over 30 years to see Luke in action again. This was such a disappointment. Disney has ruined the Star Wars of my youth. I will not go to the theater to see another Star Wars movie. If I do see any more it will be on cable.
